mapper.select: SELECT /* QuizStatMapper.selectQuizStatList */ * FROM QUIZ_STAT A WHERE QUIZ_DATE = #{quiz_date} ORDER BY QUIZ_SEQ DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* QuizStatMapper.insertQuizStat */ QUIZ_STAT(QUIZ_DATE, DOC_CODE, QUIZ_NUMBER, QUIZ_SEQ, QUIZ_NUM, SUCCESS_YN, QUIZ_TIMES, CREATE_DATE) VALUES ( date_format(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') , #{doc_code} , #{quiz_number} , #{quiz_seq} , 1 , #{success_yn} , #{quiz_times} , now())
mapper.select: SELECT /* QuizStatMapper.selectMaxQuizStatSeq */ IFNULL(MAX(QUIZ_SEQ), 0)+1 FROM QUIZ_STAT WHERE QUIZ_DATE = #{quiz_date}

SELECT /* QuizStatMapper.selectKeywordList */ A.DOC_NAME,COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT, B.SUCCESS_CNT AS SUCCESS_CNT,C.FAIL_CNT AS FAIL_CNT, COALESCE(ROUND(SUCCESS_CNT/(SUCCESS_CNT+FAIL_CNT)*100,2),0) AS SUCCESS_RATE FROM QUIZ_DOCUMENT A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.DOC_NAME,COUNT(*) AS SUCCESS_CNT FROM QUIZ_DOCUMENT A, QUIZ_STAT B WHERE B.DOC_CODE = A.DOC_CODE AND B.QUIZ_NUMBER = A.QUIZ_NUMBER AND B.SUCCESS_YN='Y' GROUP BY A.DOC_NAME) B ON A.DOC_NAME = B.DOC_NAME LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.DOC_NAME,COUNT(*) AS FAIL_CNT FROM QUIZ_DOCUMENT A, QUIZ_STAT B WHERE B.DOC_CODE = A.DOC_CODE AND B.QUIZ_NUMBER = A.QUIZ_NUMBER AND B.SUCCESS_YN!='Y' GROUP BY A.DOC_NAME) C ON A.DOC_NAME = C.DOC_NAME GROUP BY A.DOC_NAME ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
